message: This is a great opportunity to get a product at a fantastic price! It's a one-time offer, and I'm only selling it to you for $100. It's a steal!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I trust your pricing and am willing to take the risk for the potential high-quality product.

Thank you for the offer, Alice, but given the outcome of the previous product, I'm going to pass on this one to avoid any potential disappointment.
